fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: If someone's already on 4 Viridesent Venerer, or you are running her in a team that does not benefit, options such as __Tenacity of the Millelith__ or __Deepwood Memories__ are available.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Lynette | Update Date: 10/21/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__
5* Best in slot, performs similarly to other 5* options.
__Wolf Fang__
Does need a little more focus on normal attacks, but best 4* option, does need Battle Pass.
__Finale of the Deep__
Craftable option with decent damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Mistsplitter Reforged, Haran Geppaku Futsu, Light of Foliar Incision__
All stats ticks, performing similarly to each other, depending on if you have their passives or not.
